title: This Overlord Doesn’t Care About Anything - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Cross-dressing   Cunning Protagonist   Demons   Discrimination   Goblins   Goddesses   Hiding True Abilities   Kingdom Building   Knights   Lazy Protagonist   Loli   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Realms   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Poor to Rich   Quirky Characters   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sibling Rivalry   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Transmigration
author: 怀世
description:
Big shock! The laziest Overlord in all of history, Li De, committed such outrageous acts in order to recruit some subordinates! The abandoned good-for-nothing female knight, the sorcerer with demon blood, the internal affairs officer with unclear sexuality, and the disabled strategist…

These people, who were all spurned by society, were all accepted by him, how ridiculous!

“Li De, you don’t even have an iota of the majesty of an Overlord, aren’t you afraid that you’ll be ridiculed by other people?”

“Overlord? What’s an Overlord…”>
